ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Armor nicknames
ygData.msgSnippet: Anything is better than Lambent . Who comes up with this stuff? Personally, I would have named it Resonant Plate or something along those lines. Maybe the
ygData.messageBody:
Anything is better than "Lambent".
Who comes up with this stuff?

Personally, I would have named it Resonant Plate or something along those
lines. Maybe the breastplate was enchanted to resonate in harmony to
whatever instrument you were playing, amplifying it somewhat and making it
slightly more powerful.

Now THAT is class specific.

Aranlas Starchaser
Dreaming Bard of Kelethin


-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Sibbald
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: 10/17/99 2:19 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent Armor nicknames

From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>

I personally like Bluebicite.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
